text.0: turn hither agni speak to us come to us with a gracious mind.
text.1: enrich us master of the house thou art the giver of our wealth.
text.2: let aryarnan vouchsafe us wealth and bhaga and bṛhaspati.
text.3: let the gods give their gifts and let sūnṛtā goddess grant us wealth.
text.4: we call king soma to our aid and agni with our songs and hymns.
text.5: Ādityas viṣṇu sūrya and the brahman priest bṛhaspati.
text.6: indra vāyu bṛhaspati gods swift to listen we invoke.
text.7: that in the synod all the folk may be benevolent to us.
text.8: urge aryaman to send us gifts and indra and bṛhaspati.
text.9: vāta viṣṇu sarasvatī and the strong courser savitar.
text.10: do thou o agni with thy fires strengthen our prayer and sacrifice.
text.11: urge givers to bestow their wealth to aid our service of the gods.
